Articles.Content:
This is the Artemis Mk6 rocket jet, capable of delivering an orbital vehicle to the atmospheric limit with plenty of fuel to spare and a little style and luxury on the way.

I took this baby for a spin around Kerbin last night and it performed admirably, reaching 22km on jet engines before switching over to liquid rockets, making a successful orbit around the planet and then delivering the kerbinauts back home.

It\'s my first successful design combining jet engines and rockets.
